message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand you think $120 is steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. Would you be willing to go as low as $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $98?
